attributes.action: Ensure the Poppy is only used as a symbol to mark respect.
attributes.background:
The poppy should be used to show respect for those who have fallen, it should not have any political statement or party attached to it.
I believe that using the poppy as a symbol should be outlawed if not used on Armistice Day or to raise money for the poppy appeal.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the poppy. The Royal British Legion's 2-petal poppy is already a registered trademark. You can find out more on the website of the Royal British Legion:

http://www.britishlegion.org.uk/about-us/our-brand/
